bibl.title: Heraclitus Revisited (Pap. Derveni col. I lines 7-11).
bibl.note: P. Derveni, col. I, 7-11. - 1. Sources. - 2. Palaeography. - 3. The results of my searching for εἰ γὰ[ρ. - 4. The length of the lines. - 5. Conjecture. - 6. Text of my own preference.
